1573490.name: Magic Twins Soundtrack
1573490.description:
Let the Colormageddon explode in your ears (gently) in a listening experience that will take you on a journey through the Island of Mallorca (metaphorically).

Featuring an incredible range of musical styles (more than five), discover Daniel Núñez Martín's portentous ability to endlessly reuse a leitmotif and make each song seem fresh out of the oven (also metaphorically)!

Includes the voices of Abra and Cadabra!
